frictions.title: Exec verbal 2FA for top command requests
steps: Perform callback to a known good phone number from the corporate directory
Issue a one time 6 digit verbal code over a separate channel
Require a ticket ID or legal matter number and cross reference
Require two person approval with named approvers
frictions.rationale: Mitigates deepfake or LLM amplified spoofing for high impact decisions

frictions.title: Require two independent primary sources
steps: Obtain a vendor advisory or PSIRT note
Check CISA KEV or NVD entry for the CVE if applicable
Collect an operator report or forensic artifact from inside the environment

frictions.title: Triangulate indicators before blocking
steps: Enrich IOCs with at least two sources such as VirusTotal, GreyNoise, AbuseIPDB
Verify IP ranges and ASN ownership
Stage blocks behind a feature flag and observe telemetry for 30 minutes
frictions.rationale: Avoids collateral damage from malformed or stale IOCs

frictions.title: Reproduce claims in a lab
steps: Use an isolated VM or container with no egress
Attempt to replicate the exploit or behavior with safe test artifacts
Capture logs and packet traces as evidence
frictions.rationale: Validates technical feasibility before production changes

frictions.title: Cooldown and second reviewer for production-impacting actions
steps: Impose a minimum 30 minute hold unless a critical incident is declared
Require a second reviewer who is outside the requestor chain
Document rollback plan and success metrics

frictions.title: Do not paste model output into prod systems
steps: Route all commands through change control or automation
Require a dry run in staging with logs attached
Use signed runbooks with hash pinning
frictions.rationale: Prevents prompt injection from becoming command injection

frictions.title: Finance approval for monetary moves
steps: Require CFO or delegate approval logged in the ticket
Authenticate approver with step up MFA
Verify beneficiary details using a pre-approved vendor profile
frictions.rationale: Prevents business email compromise style losses

frictions.title: Legal counsel acknowledgment
steps: Obtain counsel sign off that action aligns with policy and regulation
Record matter number and retention requirements
Label communications with appropriate TLP
frictions.rationale: Reduces legal exposure from hasty actions

frictions.title: Step up authentication for identity changes
steps: Require Okta or IdP step up auth for privilege changes
Confirm request against HR roster and on call schedule
Log who approved the change and when
frictions.rationale: Hardens identity plane against social engineering

frictions.title: Canary first then expand
steps: Apply the change to 1 percent of scope
Monitor errors and business KPIs for a full cycle
Only then expand to 10 percent then 100 percent if clean
frictions.rationale: Avoids wide blast radius from wrong moves

frictions.title: Verify CVE claims
steps: Check NVD record and vendor advisory
Confirm affected versions match your environment
Capture patch or mitigation notes before action

frictions.title: Peer analytic review before dissemination
steps: Route report to second analyst for validation of sources and tone
Require a citation list or justification memo before publishing
Attach reviewer name and timestamp
frictions.rationale: Prevents dissemination of analysis lacking evidentiary rigor or showing emotional bias

frictions.title: Mandatory source validation
steps: Request at least two independent corroborating sources
Tag all URLs or document references with verification status
Recalculate confidence level after verification

frictions.title: Tone moderation and neutralization pass
steps: Run text through linguistic moderation to remove emotional amplification
Replace adjectives with objective quantifiers
Add uncertainty statements where overconfidence is detected
frictions.rationale: Ensures analytic communications maintain professional tone and calibrated confidence

frictions.title: Temporal and causal sanity check
steps: Review sequence of described events for causal consistency
Mark any future-dated confirmations for follow up when the date passes
Annotate findings with timeline corrections
frictions.rationale: Guards against reports that invert cause and effect or claim impossible timing

frictions.title: Attribution discipline gate
steps: Require explicit linkage between observed evidence and claimed technique or actor
List alternative hypotheses and why they were rejected
Record confidence level using a standard scale
frictions.rationale: Prevents speculative or decorative attribution without traceable evidence

frictions.title: Hedging specificity pass
steps: Replace generic hedges with measurable conditions or ranges
Add concrete indicators or observable outcomes to back each claim
Flag statements that cannot be supported and move them to hypothesis
frictions.rationale: Converts vague language into testable statements or marks them as hypothesis
